summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6025 for the improvement of Lander Street from 1st Avenue South to approximately 43 feet by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 81543, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
